alert.note: Alert for Calhoun; Etowah (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 17 at 3:10PM CDT by NWS Birmingham
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Calhoun and southeastern Etowah Counties through 345 PM CDT... At 309 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Gadsden Mall, or near Gadsden, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Gadsden, Jacksonville, Rainbow City, Attalla, Hokes Bluff, Glencoe, Ohatchee, Gadsden Mall, Jacksonville State University, Alexandria, Neely Henry Lake, Southside, Gadsden Steam Plant, Big Wills Creek, Gadsden Municipal Airport, Cobb City, Sulphur Springs, Gadsden Water Works, Northside and Wellington. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
